content:
"""
The furnace is currently processing with 4 pieces of iron ore remaining, but I did not see any iron plates added to my inventory after inserting the new iron ore. This indicates that the furnace is working but has not completed the smelting process yet.

The current inventory remains:
- 5 pieces of coal
- 5 pieces of stone
- 3 pieces of iron plates

Since the furnace is operational and has enough coal, I will wait briefly to allow the smelting process to complete. After a short wait, I will check the furnace output again to see how many iron plates have been produced.
"""

# Wait for a brief period to allow the smelting process to complete
sleep(10)  # Sleep for a sufficient amount of time to process

# Check the furnace output inventory for iron plates after waiting
furnace_inventory_final = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace)
print(f"Final furnace output inventory: {furnace_inventory_final}")  # Check how many iron plates have been produced
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Current inventory total: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check overall inventory again
